Name: Extreme Truck Simulator
About the game: Extreme Truck Simulator is a new funny truck game unique through its gameplay. If you thought this truck simulator will be easy, think again! Instruments such as fuel & time will help you to deliver the goods as soon as possible to the destination. Key features : - Unique gameplay featuring 5 difficult levels - Fuel consumption - Time - Upgrade system for the truck(including engine, fuel tank and more)
